original_title: Vão acabar com a Praça Onze
overview: A short documentary, composed entirely of archive footage, on "Praça Onze", a Brazilian samba song by Herivelto Martins based on actor Grande Otelo's efforts on saving Praça Onze, where Carnaval parades were held in Rio de Janeiro up to the late 1930s, from being demolished.
title: Vão acabar com a Praça Onze
